sentences.en: A fish suddenly swim into the porcupine's heart, into the fish's dreams.
sentences.cn: 一条鱼静静的游过来,又到了刺猬的心中, 揉碎了水草里面里游泳的鱼的梦.

sentences.en: A little porcupine made a house by the side of the river.
sentences.cn: 小刺猬在小河边上造了一幢小房子.

sentences.en: A lonely porcupine likes to wander to the river alone and stare into the water expressionless.
sentences.cn: 一只孤独的刺猬常常独自来到河边散步.望着水草里自己的影子,默默的出神.

sentences.en: A porcupine is covered with prickles.
Every thorn plucked is pain on the Porcupine's body and Fish's heart.
sentences.cn: 刺猬在一点点拔自己身上的刺,每拔一下都是一阵揪心的痛,每一次都痛在鱼的心上.

sentences.en: Having sexual relations with a porcupine is illegal.
sentences.cn: 与豪猪有性关系是违法的.

sentences.en: In Maine, the most commonly counted roadkill species is the North American porcupine.
sentences.cn: 在缅因州，公路交通事故中杀死的动物种类是北美箭猪。

sentences.en: It is the Kookaburra ( Porcupine ) and Skunk Kingdoms that greet you today.
sentences.cn: 今天是笑翠鸟 ( 豪猪 ) 和臭鼬王国向你们问候.

sentences.en: Lang wears so much product in his hair that when he sways in rapture to his playing his head looks like a porcupine in a typhoon.
sentences.cn: 郎朗总是对他的头发大做文章，每次表演到行头上时，他的脑袋看上去就像在台风中乱窜的一只箭猪。

sentences.en: Long sharp stiff spine of a porcupine.
Not like porcupine needles or anything, but small pointy projections on the surface that basically make the organ bumpy.
sentences.cn: 它不像豪猪的刺或其它什么的，但是在表面上有尖状的凸起使这个器官起伏不平。

sentences.en: Oh my god! Porcupine and Fish has fallen in love!
sentences.cn: 上帝 啊,鱼和刺猬相爱了!

sentences.en: One of the sharp hollow spines of a porcupine or hedgehog.
sentences.cn: 豪猪或刺猬身上硬而中空的保护刺.

sentences.en: The pectinate quills of the porcupine are barbed.
sentences.cn: 豪猪栉状的刺是会刺人的.

sentences.en: The porcupine is larger than a pig.
There, a porcupine, wild boar, pig, stupid pig, Ukraine, pig eight quit of little piglets species.
sentences.cn: 有, 豪猪, 野猪, 蠢猪, 笨猪, 乌克兰小乳猪, 猪八戒等的种类.

sentences.en: Whenever there's prickly situation, this dandruff - laden porcupine is sure to be far, far away.
sentences.cn: 只要碰到棘手的事, 这为头屑而苦的豪猪绝对会躲得远远, 远远的.

trans.tran_en: an animal with long sharp parts growing all over its back and sides
